articles.title: India set for billions of dollars of inflows as bonds join JPMorgan index - Financial Times
articles.description: Inclusion of country’s debt in major benchmark could fuel market volatility, analysts warn
articles.content: India is set to welcome billions of dollars of foreign inflows when JPMorgan adds the countrys sovereign debt to its emerging markets index on Friday, a move that some analysts say will leave it more… [+4068 chars]

articles.author: Alex Kalinauckas
articles.title: Aston Martin to build Alonso-commissioned sportscar - Motorsport.com
articles.description: British sportscar manufacturer is producing 38 versions of the track-adapted version of the Valour car following a personal commission from F1 driver Alonso
articles.content:
Aston Martin is to build a road-legal track version of its Valour sportscar the Valiant that has been personally commissioned by its Formula 1 driver Fernando Alonso.
Aston will produce 38 Valiants,… [+2733 chars]
